DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis probable Alzheimer 's disease ( DSMIV NINCDSADRDA criterion ) MRI within last 12 month consistent diagnosis AD MMSE score 10 26 CDR 1 2 AChEI memantine take least 3 month prior screen Other central nervous disease Hypothyroidism , Vitamin B12/ Folic acid deficiency , Hypercalcemia , Neurosyphilis , AIDS T.I.A Major infarction within last 12 month Any serious disorder could limit ability patient participate study COPD asthma Any condition would make patient caregiver , opinion investigator , unsuitable study
